author: Dres90
body:
#### PR description:

Include new uploader script for the V2 version of the CondDbUploader to be distributed via CMSSW

#### PR validation:

Prior validation and review was done through https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33479
This PR is an updated one to merge the code to master.
title: Add new uploader script to CMSSW to master
